...to electric.
 
 Is this possible and relatively not-to-expensive to do?
 
 I have one that has been parked for 3 years. Inside and out it is as good as new - except for the transmission.
 The mechanic has offered $350 cash for it.
 I am a pack rat and hate to get rid of anything that can be put to good use - I just can't think of what to do with this car...if nothing else, a playhouse for the grandkids? emoticon_xclown
 
 I came across this site: http://www.ddmotorsystems.com/
 and I'm not willing to invest between $3,000 & $9,000. :xbanghead
 
 Any advice?
 
 Nevermind...I just sold it. (wanted to delete this thread but, couldn't)
